price: berilah aku potongan-potongan besi". Hingga apabila besi itu telah sama rata dengan kedua (puncak) gunung itu, berkatalah Żulqarnayn, "Tiuplah (api itu)".  Hingga apabila besi itu sudah menjadi (merah seperti) api, dia pun berkata, "Berilah aku tembaga (yang mendidih) agar kutuangkan ke atas besi panas itu".
arabic: ءَاتُونِي زُبَرَ ٱلۡحَدِيدِۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا سَاوَىٰ بَيۡنَ ٱلصَّدَفَيۡنِ قَالَ ٱنفُخُواْۖ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا جَعَلَهُۥ نَارٗا قَالَ ءَاتُونِيٓ أُفۡرِغۡ عَلَيۡهِ قِطۡرٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ātūnī zubara al-ḥadīdi ḥattā idhā sāwā bayna al-ṣadafayni qāla unfukhū ḥattā idhā jaʿalahu nāran qāla ātūnī uf'righ ʿalayhi qiṭ'ran
